description: The kanji for his name means `bull.` According to legend, he was once a human who died searching for his mother. His resentment led him to become a youkai after his death. He is a high-ranked subordinate of the Nura group. He was in charge of a conspiracy against Rikuo using Kyuuso. It was revealed this coup was a means of a test, to see if Rikuo could handle being what he was and told Rikuo to abandon his human side as that would only get him killed. In response to Rikuo`s aim for being the third he works even harder now.He fought the Tengu of Mount Kurama 400 years ago. He appeared in Kyoto by the order of Nurarihyon to help Rikuo.
name: Gyuuki
